casebody.data:
Russell WALKER
v.
HOKE COUNTY, Fifth Third Bank, Inc., and Tyton NC Biofuels LLC No. 192P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Russell F. Walker, for Walker, Russell. Grady L. Hunt, Attorney at Law, Pembroke, for Hoke County. Robert B. McNeill, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Tyton NC Biofuels LLC. Jerry L. Bruner, Attorney at Law, Laurinburg, for Fifth Third Bank, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of June 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of June 2018 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
